system.description:
Nothing can escape your web, when the whole world is already entangled.

REQUIREMENTS

To become The World Weaver, you have earned the Fellowship of Spiders.

The World Weaver starts with the Move Pull The Strings.

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.in-rebellion-dpb-world-weaver.Item.wjnqherR0LdSAAaD]{PULL THE STRINGS}

CUSTOM MOVES

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.in-rebellion-dpb-world-weaver.Item.pUZXXD2ixe96quOj]{AN OMEN OF THINGS TO COME}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.in-rebellion-dpb-world-weaver.Item.53y7hbRGtHxiMLx7]{A WHISPER IN THE EAR}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.in-rebellion-dpb-world-weaver.Item.WKnaKtCBPidK0nrc]{DEADLY TRAPS}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.in-rebellion-dpb-world-weaver.Item.5asikQfB6FjXZIN9]{FROM THE SHADOWS}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.in-rebellion-dpb-world-weaver.Item.4eUcvFB47TPQEORq]{WATCH YOUR STEP}

advancements.name: Take the Spider's Core Moves (Wall Walker and Web Spinning). If you already have them, instead increase one of your stats by +1, to a maximum of +3.
